title: FormPilot
description: AI-powered form builder with real-time editing, analytics, and secure user authentication.
detailedDescription: FormPilot is an AI-powered form builder built with Next.js 15. It allows users to create and customize forms using AI-generated schemas, manage submissions, and view analytics. With a sleek, responsive design powered by Tailwind CSS and Radix UI, FormPilot ensures a modern and accessible user experience. Authentication is securely handled by Clerk, and data is stored in Neon Postgres using Drizzle ORM. FormPilot also supports exporting responses to Excel, viewing analytics through Recharts, and upgrading to Pro plans via Stripe integration.
features: AI form generation from user descriptions
Instant form previews and real-time editing
Live form analytics and engagement tracking
Excel export support for form responses
Clerk-based secure sign-in and user management
Subscription payments via Stripe for Pro plans

title: JD-Startups
description: Modern startup idea platform showcasing Next.js 15's latest features.
detailedDescription: A platform for sharing startup ideas that demonstrates Next.js 15's cutting-edge features including Forms, Unstable After, Server Component HMR Cache, and Partial Prerendering for optimal performance.
features: Dynamic startup ideas display using Sanity's Content API
Editor Picks feature for admin highlights

title: Socially
description: Full-stack social media platform with authentication, real-time updates, and responsive design.
detailedDescription: Socially is a modern social media platform built with Next.js and powered by Clerk authentication. Users can create profiles, share posts, engage with content through likes and comments, and follow other users. The platform features a responsive design that works seamlessly across desktop and mobile devices. Data is stored in a Neon SQL database with Prisma as the ORM for efficient data management.
features: Post creation with rich media support

title: BookWise
description: A comprehensive University Library Management System with user-friendly interfaces for students and administrators.
detailedDescription: BookWise is a comprehensive University Library Management System featuring an intuitive admin panel for librarians. The platform enables students to browse the catalog, borrow and return books, manage reservations, and track their reading history. Administrators can efficiently manage inventory, monitor circulation, generate reports, and handle user accounts through a secure dashboard interface.
features: Advanced book search and catalog browsing
Secure user authentication for students and staff
Rate limiting and caching for optimal performance
Automated notification system for due dates
